intro: Doria rigida, commonly known as the rigid doria, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the family Acanthaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. Doria rigida thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in shaded or semi-shaded environments.
